title: Holiday Watch Faces
summary: Add some holiday cheer to your android wear watch with four fun designs!
description: Add some holiday cheer to your android wear watch with Holiday Watch Faces by Fat Russell LLC.  Contains four fun designs to put you and everyone around you in a festive mood! NEWLY ADDED! Holiday Rudolph: Get in shape this holiday season with the Rudolph watch face. Watch his nose glow brighter with each step! You've gotta run like a reindeer outta control...Faces include: •   Holiday Rudolph•   Holiday Snowman•   Holiday Penguin•   Holiday Polar Bear All the designs work on both round and square watches and give you a cute animation when you tap on the watch face. Rudolph counts your steps, and his nose glows brighter the more steps you take!PLEASE NOTE: Watch faces may take some time to appear on your watch. Be patient, they will show up! Requires Google Fit for step counter.Check out our other watch faces on the Fat Russell Play Store page at: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Fat+Russell&hl=en
descriptionHTML:
Add some holiday cheer to your android wear watch with Holiday Watch Faces by Fat Russell LLC. Contains four fun designs to put you and everyone around you in a festive mood!

NEWLY ADDED! Holiday Rudolph: Get in shape this holiday season with the Rudolph watch face. Watch his nose glow brighter with each step! You've gotta run like a reindeer outta control...

Faces include:
•  Holiday Rudolph
•  Holiday Snowman
•  Holiday Penguin
•  Holiday Polar Bear

All the designs work on both round and square watches and give you a cute animation when you tap on the watch face. Rudolph counts your steps, and his nose glows brighter the more steps you take!

PLEASE NOTE: Watch faces may take some time to appear on your watch. Be patient, they will show up! Requires Google Fit for step counter.

Check out our other watch faces on the Fat Russell Play Store page at: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Fat+Russell&hl=en
comments: I like that it had different Christmas watch faces.
Another essential watch face Each of these creations puts a smile on people's faces when they notice the designs and all the little details in them
Cute &love, but, only Rudolph shows time+date/steps/battery% left. Others only date except snowman which has nothing but pic. Add same features as Rudolph for 5 stars ;)
Great watch face for my wife but the ambient displays are dull, and they need at least the date displayed either on both displays or at least on the lit display (only Rudolph has it at all)
Hey, cute face!! I really like the watch faces. They are a simple design and festive. I am not a fan of how they look in "Ambient Mode" though.
Would like the date on all the watch faces.
recentChanges: - Support for stand-alone watch face. Now can be used with iPhone!
- Snow snow snow.  Added snow animations.
- Added new Rudolph watch face.  Take more steps and watch his nose glow!  (Requires Google Fit)
